title: Can we get Custom Games with actual Customisation?
body:
At the moment the only real options to choose from when creating custom games are team sizes, map, and draft mode. 
When is Riot gonna catch up with other online multiplayer games of this caliber a la DotA 2 and Overwatch. 
Things as simple as;
- Customized base/max CD reductions.
- Damage Modifiers (+__%, -__%, Start with Bonus AP/AD, etc).
- Modifiable shop prices (Either by item, or just general % changes)
- Passive and Active Gold Gen rates
- Respawn time modification
- Allow Legacy Items
- Minion/Neutral Camp spawn rates

Bring actual customisation to League of Legends custom games, please. 
Being stuck with the same 2 maps and handful of draft modes until Rotating Game Modes roll around is tiresome, especially when this game is designed to be played in 25-35 minute uninterrupted intervals lest you be faced with the ban hammer.

Give us the options to play this game and have fun if and when we'd like to.
Not just when you decide to bring back URF.

- Bababooie

replies.body: Bumping for more exposure; Any thoughts /comments from others? What else would you want to see available to Customise is Customs?
